Xml And Oracle 8i

28 Dec 1999

Everyone knows the latest and greatest buzz on the Web is about XML these days. Now that everyone is aware of the benefits XML provides, where do you go from there?

\n

\nThe XML Journal has a good article this month that gives some basic information on how to tie the power of XML into your Oracle database. A nice read if you're interested in knowing more about Oracle 8i's XML capabilities, and the role of XML in database's in general.\n
